# UISwitch.Style.automatic

**Case**

A style indicating that the system chooses the appearance of the switch according to the current user interface idiom.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

The system chooses the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwitch/Style-swift.enum/checkbox] style when the user interface idiom is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUserInterfaceIdiom/mac]; otherwise, it chooses the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwitch/Style-swift.enum/sliding] style.

## Styles

- **UISwitch.Style.checkbox**: A style indicating that the switch appears as a Mac-style checkbox.
- **UISwitch.Style.sliding**: A style indicating that the switch appears as an on/off slider.
